body.name: Laptop Stand Adjustable Laptop Computer Stand Multi-Angle Stand Phone Stand Portable Foldable Laptop Riser Notebook Holder Stand Compatible for 10 to 17” Laptops
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 18 hrs 27 mins
features: Adjustable - Eight heights can be freely adjusted from 5.5inch to 7.0inch. You can straighten your waist and relieve cervical and neck fatigue, feel comfortable to work.

Durable - Made of lightweight ABS with non-slip rubber surface pads to keep laptop in place, strong and reliable, not easy to fade. Compatible with all laptops 10-15.6”, durable enough to support up to 44 lbs (20kg).
Portable - Foldable and easy to place. Convenient to carry and use at home, the office or somewhere else.
360° Rotatable - The bottom design has a turntable, easy to rotate the computer and share with others. The mobile phone bracket is designed on the side, easy for placement and viewing.
Hollow design - Reduce the contact area with the desktop, which provides a cavity and is more conducive to heat dissipation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely perfect, great adjustability, sturdy, and well built. I can't really say much more, because it just does what it is supposed to and that's perfect. The only thing I could mention, is the cell phone holder is a little pointless, in all reality most people use a charging stand if they are using a stand at all, but you can just fold it away and it's like it isn't even there!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and Convenient
reviews.reviewText: The plastic wouldn't survive a medium fall off a desk onto a hard floor, but it functions and stores very easily and works as intended, completely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Honestly most of this is on me for not paying enough attention before buying because the information is RIGHT THERE but some things I think could use improvements.Some initial impressions:It is kind of small for an actual laptop. I have a 17" one and everything feels wobbly and crooked while typing.Like others pointed out, with a laptop of this size the phone holder becomes useless. Not like I could've used it anyway because it holds phones upright instead of at an angle.While I appreciate the turning base it feels kinda useless if you are trying to sit upright at a desk against a wall or cubicle. I would much rather it was easier to move the base around to straighten my set up up and have the base be a lot more steady than have a base that spins on itself and makes it difficult to move around. But again this is a detail I didn't see before purchasing so that's more of a heads up for anyone that works on a desk without moving around much rather than a criticism.The plastic does feel very cheap. From the pictures the whole thing did look a lot sturdier and maybe it was just the texture and design but the actual thing feels like it could break easily. The turning base combined with the cheap plastic just makes me nervous, is it trembling? Am I trembling? Is my desk trembling? Idk.PROS: Well it does hold it up and I can see the screen at a better angle now haha. And I might be able to use it until I find something better I suppose. I don't think it will drop my laptop, at the very least.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EASY, CHEAP WAY TO VIEW YOUR LAPTOP
reviews.reviewText: It works great. Adjust it once and leave it. Very slim to take with you. I don't find the phone holder very useful but I have a very thick case on my phone. With a slim case, it will hold it fine for viewing. Good price, very useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable & User Friendly
reviews.reviewText: Loved that you could sit your phone in the holder while being on your laptop! You can sit it on your lap or table. The stand can put your laptop at different angles. It’s very portable and heavy duty!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy construction and reasonable price; large issues with balance and phone holder
reviews.reviewText: THE GOOD: The product mostly works well for its intended use. No complaints so far on its actual ability to securely hold my laptop, and the angle options are good. The construction also feels decently solid. The mechanism for holding the laptop in place seems reliable, and I’m not worried that it will ever fall or slip.THE BAD: My first problem lies with the rotating base on the bottom of this product. The ability to spin it around smoothly is a nice little added feature, but not something I really cared about. The issue, however, is that it makes the stand not sit flat on my desk. So when I put even a little bit of pressure on either side, it rocks back and forth in an extremely annoying way. My other major complaint is the terrible placement of the phone holder. The phone is displayed quite far behind and below the laptop. If this wasn’t enough, when I’m using the laptop’s USB port on the left (as I always am with my USB mouse), it completely blocks the phone’s screen. My first picture shows this (HP Elitebook 14” shown in picture, but it also happens with my Acer Aspire 15.6”).BOTTOM LINE: The product mostly works well for its main intended use. If you’ve read this review and don’t think you’d be bothered by the stability issue or the phone holder’s placement, then go ahead and buy it. From my research, the price for this one is good compared to others with similar sturdiness. But in my case, I wish I did a little more research (or spent a little more), because the problems I listed are hard to ignore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good stand for my Chromebook
reviews.reviewText: This computer stand is lightweight, easily adjusted, and holds my Chromebook well. As a downside, the arm that swings to the side to hold my smartphone is too narrow to hold my phone with the case protector. I'm not about to remove the case protector when I'm using USB tethering to provide an internet connection from my smartphone. I'll simply set the phone to the side. I like the swiveling feature, which is very convenient. It's a little on the lightweight side, so it rocks very slightly from side to side when I'm typing, but that's not a big deal. Being lightweight makes it easily portable. It does raise my screen up significantly so I don't have to bend my neck down when using it, giving me greater comfort. I'm very satisfied with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, elegant solution! Invaluable.
reviews.reviewText: Raises the laptop to eye level for video calling; lifts the angle for typing so that I can see everything better, and have a more comfortable angle for typing. Lightweight. I carry it with me for in-person meetings and appointments, to better show work as we sit side by side. Invaluable!
Rempli amplement les fonctions de support d'un portable. Très versatile et durable.

I actually have really like this product it does as advertised with a sturdy build quality and couple little extra features. I like how along the bottom there is a lip to catch your laptop from sliding up and over the stop at the bottom as well as if you have a thicker laptop there are additional larger clips that flip up and help secure your laptop. I have a HP Elitebook and haven't had to use them but a nice addition regardless. I also like how the support leg clicks into the laptop table then will click into the base lightly so when it's folded its held securely together. I do wish the phone stand that swings out did so on the other side of the dock so the right instead of left side. But other than that has been a great at helping my ergonomic situation when working at home.

reviews.reviewTitle: Solid Construction with a couple extras
reviews.reviewText: I actually have really like this product it does as advertised with a sturdy build quality and couple little extra features. reviews.reviewTitle: Reasonably Priced Product That Serves Its Purpose
reviews.reviewText: Served its purpose if saving space. Appeared flimsy but was actually very sturdy.
Great for travelling. A little too big and heavy for my taste but totally worth it.
